title: Guadalcanal/Leckie
description: Veteran Sergeant John Basilone ships out soon after Pearl Harbor for Guadalcanal while other young enlistees are sent to boot camp.

title: Basilone
description: Outmanned and with supplies low, Basilone and other marines on Guadacanal rally to repel superior Japanese forces.

title: Melbourne
description: After arduous months in Guadalcanal, exhausted marines are given rest and recreation in Melbourne, where they find the girls friendly and the beer cold.

title: Gloucester/Pavuvu/Banika
description: After leaving Melbourne, the weather works against the leathernecks as Lechie falls seriously ill and Sledge gets assigned to New Britain.

title: Peleliu Landing
description: Basilone's fame keeps him in the U.S. selling war bonds, Leckie rejoins his company, and Sledge is reunited with Phillips in Pavuvu.

title: Peleliu Airfield
description: Water is in short supply and the stifling heat takes control on Peleliu as Leckie is wounded and evacuated.

title: Peleliu Hills
description: Sledge finds the carnage and death of his companions on Peleilu increasingly difficult to bear as Basilone continues his bond drive in the States.

title: Iwo Jima
description: Frustrated with his bond selling tour, Basilone goes back to training troops and after marrying a pretty marine sergeant, leads his men at Iwo Jima.

title: Okinawa
description: The 1st Marine Division fight a determined Japanese force on Okinawa who prefer death to surrender and are indifferent to the lives of Okinawan civilians.

title: Home
description: After V-J Day Leckie and Sledge return home and try to readjust to civilian life.
